thread.title: What time is PSG vs Barcelona and where can I watch the game for free?
thread.title_full: What time is PSG vs Barcelona and where can I watch the game for free?

title: What time is PSG vs Barcelona and where can I watch the game for free?

organizations.name: bt sport showcase on freeview channel 59

text:
What time is PSG vs Barcelona and where can I watch the game for free? Getty Images 0 08-Feb-2017 19:50:49 Find out exactly how you can watch the BT Sport live coverage of the Champions League last 16 game between PSG vs Barcelona for free 
As a Valentine's Day treat to football fans in the UK, BT Sport are streaming the Champions League match between PSG and Barcelona free to all viewers. 
Even if you do not have a BT Subscription, you can watch PSG vs Barca free, and enjoy the romance of the cup in the last 16 of this season's Champions League. 
Barca fail in raid of Bayern's Tillman 
To stream the Champions League game, all you have to do is tune into BT Sport Showcase on Freeview Channel 59 . It's as simple as that! 
Anyone with a subscription to BT already can watch it as well as part of their normal package, and even stream PSG vs Barcelona online if they wish. 
Regular subscribers can tune into the match on BT Sport 2 or BT Sport 2 HD to enjoy the live stream of the game. 
PSG boss Unai Emery is confident his side can produce an upset in the tie by defeating the Catalan giants. 
Speaking after the draw for the knockout stage, Emery told reporters that he was happy to be pitted against Luis Enrique's team. 
The baffling mystery of Thomas Muller 
"Barcelona are well known to PSG, the coaching staff and myself," he said. "The important thing is that this is a game we want to win, We will prepare ourselves to play two good games and we have the ability to go through. 
"Both sides could win the tie. I’m not going to give a percentage as to the chances of one or the other, but I’m content to be playing Barcelona.” 
PSG vs Barcelona kicks off at 17:45 GMT on February 14 and can be watched for free on BT Sport Showcase. Related
